home.testUsersExplained: These are the users that the lecturers can use to perform tests on our application.
home.info: FamList is the ultimate app for families to stay organized and make shopping a breeze. Say goodbye to forgotten items and hello to a stress-free grocery experience!
home.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Click on the button below to view your families!
home.ready: Ready to simplify your familyâ€™s grocery planning? Click below to sign up and get started!
home.collab2: Everyone in the family can add items to the shared list.
home.accessable2: Update and view lists on any device, anytime.
home.streamlined2: Check items off as you shop for a smooth experience.
home.reminder2: Get reminders so you never miss adding an item again.
home.step1: Create a family group and invite members to join.
home.step2: Start adding items to the shared grocery list.
home.step3: Mark items as purchased during your shopping trips.
home.step4: Enjoy a stress-free and efficient grocery shopping experience!
